data.eml:eml: North American species of Diamphidaxona (Acari: Hydrachnida: Hygrobatidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smith, Ian M., Cook, David R. (2006): North American species of Diamphidaxona (Acari: Hydrachnida: Hygrobatidae). Zootaxa 1279: 1-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173379
